message:
Hello folks,
I'm trying to make a web service to help make a live video stream between multiple mobile devices (Android and iOS) using the same application (something like google hangout video)
well, I don't know how to begin or what to do. I tried searching a lot but I couldn't understand anything. I found something called Kickflip 
(https://kickflip.io/)
but I couldn't understand its mechanism.
the question here is : what is the mechanism of something like this to be developed as a web service ?
Any suggestions for a library for this for Android and iOS ?

Note : web service is developed using ASP.NET Web API
story: Abdullah El-menawy shared a link to the group: Egyptian Geeks.
name: Live Video Streaming SDK - Kickflip
caption: kickflip.io
description: Kickflip is a revolution in mobile video broadcasting. For the first time ever, any application can have high definition, live video broadcasting.
